definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: A preliminary study on the mycelial pure culture conditions of cenococcum geophilum fr.
sentences.chinese: 菌丝体纯培养条件的初步研究。

sentences.english: The growth speed of hypha was partly correlated with the change of enzyme activity.
sentences.chinese: 菌丝的生长速度与酶的活力变化有一定的相关性。

sentences.english: After sows seeds three days the condition of the sprout hypha .
sentences.chinese: 播种三天后菌丝萌发状况。

sentences.english: When a white mycelium develops, the cubes, are aged in salted rice wine.
sentences.chinese: 当白色菌丝形成后，豆腐块被放在咸的米酒中成熟。

sentences.english: Five compounds have been isolated from the water soluble portion of the mycelium.
sentences.chinese: 我们从菌丝体的水溶部分分得五种化学成分。

sentences.english: Seen here are branching hyphae of Aspergillus invading a cerebral vessel.
sentences.chinese: 图示曲霉菌的分枝状菌丝正侵入脑血管。

sentences.english: A fungus ball composed of blue-staining hyphal elements of Aspergillus is seen here in a bronchus.
sentences.chinese: 支气管处可见由蓝色的菌丝构成的真菌球。

sentences.english: The pathogenicity of hypha and spore was weakened.
sentences.chinese: 菌丝和分生孢子致病性减弱。

sentences.english: White, cottony mycelia may be observed in early morning hours when dew is present.
sentences.chinese: 有露水的清晨可能会见到白色的，棉花样的菌丝体。

sentences.english: Club-shaped hyphae in the hymenial layer of certain basidiomycete fungi are also termed paraphyses.
sentences.chinese: 某些担子菌的子实层中的棒状菌丝也称为侧丝。

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the extraction process for mycelia polysaccharides of fungi Phellinus igniarius.
sentences.chinese: 目的筛选药用真菌桑黄菌丝体多糖的最佳提取工艺。

sentences.english: There are no correlation of mycelial dry weights with oxalate production.
sentences.chinese: 菌丝产量与草酸产量没有相关性。

sentences.english: The vitamin inositol could obviously stimulate the growth of mycelium.
sentences.chinese: 维生素肌醇对菌丝生长有明显的促进作用。

sentences.english: The mycelium physiological property of Pleurotus eryngii (DC. ex Fr. ) Quél was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 采用平板培养法研究了杏鲍菇菌丝的营养生理特性。

sentences.english: In the middle is the hypha which grows in the normal condition , two sides for are infected hypha .
sentences.chinese: 中间为正常情况下生长的菌丝，两侧为被感染的菌丝。

sentences.english: In the middle is the hypha which grows in the normal condition , two sides for are infected hypha .
sentences.chinese: 中间为正常情况下生长的菌丝，两侧为被感染的菌丝。

definition: axillary bud/bud growing from axil of plant
terminal bud (growing at the tip of a plant)
